value.package.json:
{
  "name": "tailwindspark-monorepo",
  "version": "1.0.16",
  "description": "TailwindSpark - A comprehensive Tailwind CSS showcase monorepo with React and TypeScript. Part of the WebSpark portfolio by Mark Hazleton.",
  "keywords": [
    "tailwind",
    "react",
    "typescript",
    "monorepo",
    "design-system",
    "webspark",
    "ui-components",
    "dashboard"
  ],
  "author": {
    "name": "Mark Hazleton",
    "email": "mark@markhazleton.com",
    "url": "https://markhazleton.com"
  },
  "homepage": "https://markhazleton.github.io/tailwind-demo/",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/markhazleton/tailwind-demo.git"
  },
  "private": true,
  "type": "module",
  "workspaces": [
    "packages/*",
    "apps/*"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "preversion": "node scripts/increment-version.js",
    "build": "npm run preversion && turbo run build",
    "prebuild:deploy": "tsx scripts/generate-meta.ts",
    "build:deploy": "npm run prebuild:deploy && turbo run build --filter=@tailwindspark/demo-app",
    "rev": "node scripts/revision.js",
    "build:ci": "npx turbo run build --filter=@tailwindspark/design-tokens && npx turbo run build --filter=@tailwindspark/ui-components && npx turbo run build --filter=@tailwindspark/demo-app",
    "dev": "turbo run dev",
    "preview": "npm run preview --workspace=@tailwindspark/demo-app",
    "lint": "turbo run lint",
    "clean": "turbo run clean",
    "type-check": "turbo run type-check",
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}\"",
    "test": "turbo run test",
    "test:ui": "turbo run test:ui",
    "test:coverage": "turbo run test:coverage",
    "performance:test": "node scripts/performance-test.mjs",
    "lighthouse:ci": "lhci autorun"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@axe-core/react": "^4.11.0",
    "@tailwindcss/forms": "^0.5.10",
    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4.1.16",
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.19",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^6.9.1",
    "@testing-library/react": "^16.3.0",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^14.6.1",
    "@types/jest-axe": "^3.5.9",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^4.0.6",
    "@vitest/ui": "^4.0.6",
    "eslint": "^9.39.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.10.2",
    "jest-axe": "^10.0.0",
    "jsdom": "^27.1.0",
    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
    "prettier-plugin-tailwindcss": "^0.7.1",
    "rimraf": "^6.1.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.16",
    "tsx": "^4.20.6",
    "turbo": "^2.6.0",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.46.2",
    "vitest": "^4.0.6"
  },
  "packageManager": "npm@11.6.2",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "ajv": "^8.17.1",
    "web-vitals": "^5.1.0"
  }
}
